title: Mackie’Ing: Anthony Mackie Says Black Director For Black Panther Film Isn’t Important
text: The Falcon depicter says hiring a black director for the Marvel movie starring Chadwick Boseman is not important 'at all.' AceShowbiz 2 days ago - Entertainment Anthony Mackie definitely has a way of explaining himself.
